unit.select: select tc_mantic_categorias.id_categoria as id_key, tc_mantic_categorias.* from tc_mantic_categorias where {condicion}
select * from tc_mantic_categorias where clave = '{clave}' order by clave
select tc_mantic_categorias.id_categoria as id_key, tc_mantic_categorias.* from tc_mantic_categorias where nombre like '%{nombre}%' and descripcion like '%{descripcion}%'
